DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study see nitazoxanide ( NTZ ) use treat AIDS patient suffer cryptosporidiosis ( diarrhea cause parasite Cryptosporidium ) .

Non-responders partial responder may continue therapy additional 14 day discretion physician . Non-responders show sign improvement partial response 28 day relapse follow complete response may continue therapy additional month , 60 day total . DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Patients may eligible study : Are 3 65 year old ( need consent parent guardian 18 ) . Have AIDS . Have CD4 count less equal 200 cells/mm3 . ( Note : Patients CD4 count great 200 cells/mm3 cryptosporidiosis least 4 week may eligible study . ) Test positive parasite Cryptosporidium severe diarrhea ( least 4 bowel movement per day ) least 2 week . Have receive treatment cryptosporidiosis become reinfected treatment . Agree practice abstinence use effective method birth control ( condom ) study . Exclusion Criteria Patients eligible study : Are pregnant . Are infected certain parasite . Have history certain intestinal disease . Have receive certain medication .
